channel.title: [Joke Class Suggestion]The Prince/The Duke
channel.description: > # [color=steblue]The Prince[/color] :shield: > **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon Killer[/color]** > > **Passive (Unstoppable)** - Cannot be occupied or redirected. > **Passive (Royal Blood)** - Can put your name forward for nominations to become The Next King. > > **Day Ability (Imprison)** - Choose a player to jail tonight. Abilities targeting them at night will be prevented. Can only imprison the same player 3 times.(Infinite Uses) > > **Night Ability (Execute)** - Execute the jailed player. If they are **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon[/color]** , you will no longer be able to **Execute**. Not Usable until N3.(3 Uses) >**Goal:** *Defeat [color=purple]The Unseen[/color]/[color=darkred]The Cult[/color] and any [color=gray]Neutrals[/color] that seek you harm.* > > **[color=purple]Converts into:[/color]** > > # [color=purple]The Duke[/color] :shield: > **[color=purple]Unseen Killer[/color]** > > **Passive (Untouchable)** - Cannot be occupied or redirected. Will not become **[color=purple]The Assassin[/color]** if the previous one dies. Won't know who **[color=purple]The Unseen[/color]** is. > **Passive (Royal Blood)** - Can put your name forward for nominations to become The Next King. > > **Day Ability (Imprison)** - Choose a player to jail tonight. Abilities targeting them at night will be prevented. Can only imprison the same player 3 times.(Infinite Uses) > **Day Ability (Aid)** - Check if a player is **[color=purple]Unseen[/color]**.(1 Use) > > **Night Ability (Execute)** - Execute the jailed player. If they are **[color=purple]Unseen[/color]** , you will no longer be able to **Execute**. Not Usable until N3. (3 Uses) > **Night Ability (Nightshade)** - Poison the jailed player. They will be notified that they have been poisoned the next day.(2 Uses) >**Goal:** *Defeat [color=steblue]The Blue Dragon[/color] and any [color=gray]Neutrals[/color] that seek you harm.*

item.title: [Joke Class Suggestion]The Prince/The Duke

item.description:
Converted prince is too strong which is why we don’t have it.

Telling you now for a evil prince to ever be balanced at MOST he can only have 1 execute

Read full topic

item.title: [Joke Class Suggestion]The Prince/The Duke
item.dc:creator: NAOtheRitualist
item.description:
The Prince

Blue Dragon Killer

Passive (Unstoppable) - Cannot be occupied or redirected.
Passive (Royal Blood) - Can put your name forward for nominations to become The Next King.

Day Ability (Imprison) - Choose a player to jail tonight. Abilities targeting them at night will be prevented. Can only imprison the same player 3 times.(Infinite Uses)

Night Ability (Execute) - Execute the jailed player. If they are Blue Dragon , you will no longer be able to Execute. Not Usable until N3.(3 Uses)
Goal: Defeat The Unseen/The Cult and any Neutrals that seek you harm.

Converts into:

The Duke

Unseen Killer

Passive (Untouchable) - Cannot be occupied or redirected. Will not become The Assassin if the previous one dies. Won’t know who The Unseen is.
Passive (Royal Blood) - Can put your name forward for nominations to become The Next King.

Day Ability (Imprison) - Choose a player to jail tonight. Abilities targeting them at night will be prevented. Can only imprison the same player 3 times.(Infinite Uses)
Day Ability (Aid) - Check if a player is Unseen.(1 Use)

Night Ability (Execute) - Execute the jailed player. If they are Unseen , you will no longer be able to Execute. Not Usable until N3. (3 Uses)
Night Ability (Nightshade) - Poison the jailed player. They will be notified that they have been poisoned the next day.(2 Uses)
Goal: Defeat The Blue Dragon and any Neutrals that seek you harm.

Read full topic
